TextView.android:text: \t\tNote: These are short descriptions of rituals commonly known in-game. Additional rituals exist but you must discover them in game. Many rituals have additional powers beyond those listed in summary!
Creates a Healing Circle which can identify Healing magic and be used to resurrect spirits.
Creates a 10ft circle which senses as life and undead are affected by an Arcane Blind if crossed.
Creates a chalice that can purify liquids and make 1 Sweetwater potion every day.
An aura that repels all Lesser Undead away from the caster for a short time.
A single Healing spell may be Power Word Directed instead of packet-delivered.
Creates a small Healing Elemental buddy to help you out.
Purifies the land and suffuses it with Healing energies.
Grants the investees a 1/day Recover that affects all within the circle.
Extends the duration of Healing rituals by 3 months per stack, max 12 months.
A ritual-level Death Ward and Blindness on the origin of a death effect.
This magic lantern attracts Undead creatures.
Like Healing Hands, but works with all Healing battle magic spells.
Like the battle magic spell of the same name, but this affects all who hear the call.
Allows the caster add the Ritual prefix to a single Healing battle magic spell 1/day.
The circle can be charged with Healing spells then investees may then use those spells.
Effects that would not normally persist through death may now do so, and vice-versa.
Each Healing battle magic spell cast on another target also affects the caster.
Like Dawnblade, but actual Healing instead of just Magic.
A ritual-level Death Ward plus immunity to death effects for 1 min when it triggers.
The target becomes immune to spells and effects that would raise them as an Undead.
The target can be charged with healing energy to be expended later.
Like the battle magic spell of the same name, but this affects all who hear the call.
Adds 1 year to the duration of Dark rituals.
Reduce the age of the target by one age bracket, maximum of young adult.
Investees and touched targets regenerate 2 body a minute.
Like the battle magic spell of the same name, but this affects all who hear the call.
Turns 1/ever Healing ritual effects into 1/day effects.
The caster becomes immaterial for a short time and can only be hurt with Infliction.
Contingency Life plus immunity to numerical damage for 10 mins if you don't use skills.
Suspends bleed and death counts of creatures with spirits inside the Circle for 1 hour.
Destroys a Greater Undead, if it fails you can try again 1/min for 10 minutes.
Teleports the willing who are bleeding and dying to your Healing Circle.
Turns a Healing ritual circle into a hoop for easy transport.
Power Word Area: Cure Serious Wounds
One for Me, One for You
